oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A Bushman child warned by its father not to look at the Moon as it rises behind the Mountain, for fear of arousing its anger and causing it to become obscured (L II.-35. 3157 rev.). ||kabbo was told by his father not to look at the Moon as it came out as it would become angry and make darkness, which the people fear.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jantje Tooren told by his father not to look towards the Moon as it comes out
